alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 22 at 2:41PM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 4 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Lowlands of the Bootheel. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 4 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will peak Wednesday afternoon. Blowing snow may reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
